resources.string:
1. Do you feel ill today, or have you had any of the following symptoms, these last 10 days? 
 + Fever 
 + Cough 
 + Shortness of Breath 
 + Fatigue 
 + Muscle or Body Aches 
 + Head Aches 
 + Loss of Taste / Smell 
 + Sore Throat 
 + Runny Nose 
 + Nausea 
 + Diarrhea
2. Have you had a POSITIVE test for COVID-19 within the past 10 days? or tested within the past 10 days?
3. Have you had close contact with a COVID-19 POSITIVE individual within the last 14 days?
5. Have you been advised to QUARANTINE within the last 14 days?
